column4: [12:58]  <gnomefreak> spoon: you want speed go with xfce or fluxbox or enlightenment
kde is faster than gnome imo
kde is satifies my speed needs
especially given the level of customization you can achieve
even fluxbox has eye candy these days :)
yes, flv often is a bit out of sync - are you using flash ?
the linux flash player sucks basically - nothing much can be done as it is closed source
if you can download the video mplayer plays flv
ffplay can also play flv with the right codecs
